roleset.name: make steady
roleset.note: STEADY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'steady' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from steady.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: bad stylistics
example.text: But then steady, concentrated buying by Bear, Stearns& Co., which frequently buys stock for corporate raiders, took hold and steadied the fall in UAL, which eventually buoyed the entire market.
example.arg: steady, concentrated buying by Bear, Stearns& Co., which frequently buys stock for corporate raiders,
